# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 0.5.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| < 0.5   | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

make the subject something referring to "buckshot security issue", thank you
